---
category: news
title: "Machine learning model to project the impact of COVID-19 on US motor gasoline demand"
excerpt: "The COVID 19 pandemic and consequent lockdown has had a substantial impact on mobility and therefore fuel demand and it is not clear when demand will recover. Ou et al. use a machine learning model that integrates health recovery scenarios to project the near-term future of gasoline demand."
publishedDateTime: 2020-07-17T09:16:00Z
